## Tony Awards: A Spotlight on Broadway Excellence

The Tony Awards honor the best plays and performances on Broadway. They're named after Antoinette "Tony" Perry, a theater legend.  

Given by the American Theatre Wing and The Broadway League, these awards celebrate actors, directors, and behind-the-scenes talent.  The ceremony is held each June in Manhattan. Winning a Tony is like winning an Oscar for theater!
